statements: SELECT * FROM patient_records ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_records WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01' AND date_of_birth <= '2000-01-01'
SELECT id, prescriptions FROM patient_records WHERE JSON_LENGTH(prescriptions) > 0
SELECT id, lab_results FROM patient_records WHERE JSON_EXTRACT(lab_results, '$.blood_pressure') < 120
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_records WHERE id = 'e81c8382-84e9-4b03-b9b7-860e53f49fca';
SELECT id, prescriptions FROM patient_records WHERE lab_results->'test_type' = 'blood pressure';
SELECT patient_name, prescriptions FROM patient_records WHERE prescriptions->'medication_name' = 'Aspirin';
SELECT * FROM lab_results
SELECT patient_id, result_type, result_value FROM lab_results WHERE result_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM prescriptions ORDER BY prescription_date DESC
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 12345
SELECT id, patient_id, result_type, result_value, result_date FROM lab_results JOIN prescriptions ON lab_results.patient_id = prescriptions.patient_id
SELECT * FROM lab_results WHERE result_type = 'Glucose' ORDER BY result_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS total_results FROM lab_results GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage > 50 ORDER BY prescription_date ASC
SELECT patient_id, SUM(dosage) AS total_dosage FROM prescriptions GROUP BY patient_id HAVING SUM(dosage) > 100
SELECT patient_id, AVG(result_value) AS avg_result_value FROM lab_results GROUP BY patient_id
SELECT * FROM LabResults;
SELECT patient_id, test_name, result FROM LabResults WHERE test_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, drug_name, dosage FROM Prescriptions WHERE frequency = 'daily';
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT id, full_name, contact_number FROM Patients ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM LabResults WHERE test_name = 'Blood Test';
SELECT drug_name, dosage FROM Prescriptions WHERE frequency = 'Daily';
SELECT id, full_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT id, patient_id, test_name, result, test_date FROM LabResults INNER JOIN Patients ON LabResults.patient_id = Patients.id;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '2000-01-01'
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM HealthcareProviders ORDER BY provider_id DESC
SELECT prescription_id, prescription_name, dosage FROM Prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 2
SELECT test_name, result_value, result_date FROM LabResults ORDER BY result_date
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT p.first_name, l.test_name, pr.prescription_name FROM Patients p JOIN LabResults l ON p.patient_id = l.patient_id JOIN Prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM HealthcareProviders WHERE provider_name LIKE '%Dr%' ORDER BY specialty;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1980-01-01' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage, instructions FROM Prescriptions WHERE prescription_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, contact_number FROM Doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT test_name, result_value FROM LabResults WHERE result_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT medication_name, dosage, instructions FROM Prescriptions WHERE prescription_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, contact_number FROM Doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
